effect.ruby_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. After the battle ends, the winner receives five times the user’s level in extra money for each time this move was used.
effect.emerald: Inflicts regular damage. After the battle ends, the winner receives five times the user’s level in extra money for each time this move was used.
effect.firered_leafgreen: Inflicts regular damage. After the battle ends, the winner receives five times the user’s level in extra money for each time this move was used.
effect.colosseum: Inflicts regular damage. After the battle ends, the winner receives five times the user’s level in extra money for each time this move was used.
effect.xd: Inflicts regular damage. After the battle ends, the winner receives five times the user’s level in extra money for each time this move was used.

short_effect.ruby_sapphire: Scatters money on the ground worth five times the user’s level.
short_effect.emerald: Scatters money on the ground worth five times the user’s level.
short_effect.firered_leafgreen: Scatters money on the ground worth five times the user’s level.
short_effect.colosseum: Scatters money on the ground worth five times the user’s level.
short_effect.xd: Scatters money on the ground worth five times the user’s level.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Throws coins at the foe. Money is recovered after.
flavor_text.emerald: Throws coins at the foe. Money is recovered after.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: Numerous coins are hurled at the foe. Money is earned after battle.
